Class FlightBookingSystem

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.FlightBookingSystem
public class FlightBookingSystem extends Object
Core class representing the flight booking system. Manages customers, flights, and bookings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FlightBookingSystem()
    Default constructor initializing the data manager.

      Adds a new customer with an auto-generated ID.
      Parameters:
      name - the customer's name
      phone - the customer's phone number
      Returns:
      the newly created Customer object

    • addCustomer

      public Customer addCustomer(int id, String name, String phone)
      Adds a new customer with a specified ID (used for loading existing data).
      Parameters:
      id - the customer ID
      name - the customer's name
      phone - the customer's phone number
      Returns:
      the newly created Customer object

    • addCustomer

      public Customer addCustomer(String name, String phone, int age, String address, String country, String passportNumber, LocalDate passportExpiryDate, boolean disabled, String email, LocalDate dob, String gender)
      Adds a new customer with extended details including passport and personal info.
      Parameters:
      name - the customer's name
      phone - the customer's phone number
      age - the customer's age
      address - the customer's address
      country - the customer's country
      passportNumber - the customer's passport number
      passportExpiryDate - the expiry date of the passport
      disabled - whether the customer is disabled
      email - the customer's email
      dob - the customer's date of birth
      gender - the customer's gender
      Returns:
      the newly created Customer object

    • addCustomerDirect

      public void addCustomerDirect(Customer customer) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a customer directly to the system, ensuring no duplicates.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to add
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the customer ID or passport already exists

    • addFlight

      public Flight addFlight(String flightNumber, String airlineName, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, LocalTime departureTime, LocalTime arrivalTime, LocalDate arrivalDate, boolean isInternational)
      Adds a new flight with auto-generated ID.
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - flight number
      airlineName - airline name
      origin - origin airport/location
      destination - destination airport/location
      departureDate - date of departure
      departureTime - time of departure
      arrivalTime - time of arrival
      arrivalDate - date of arrival
      isInternational - whether flight is international
      Returns:
      the newly created Flight object

    • getCustomerById

      public Customer getCustomerById(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Retrieves a customer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the customer ID
      Returns:
      the Customer object
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if no customer with the given ID exists

    • getFlightById

      Retrieves a flight by its ID.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the Flight object
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if no flight with the given ID exists

    • bookFlight

      public Booking bookFlight(int customerId, int flightId, LocalDate bookingDate, Booking.SeatClass seatClass, String petType, double petCharge) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Books a flight for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the customer's ID
      flightId - the flight's ID
      bookingDate - the date of booking
      seatClass - the seat class
      petType - type of pet (if any)
      petCharge - additional charge for pet
      Returns:
      the created Booking object
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if customer or flight not found or booking fails

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(int bookingId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Cancels a booking by its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the booking ID
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if booking not found or not active
